com.faanggang.wisetrack.controllers

Class PublishingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faanggang.wisetrack.controllers.PublishingManager

  • public class PublishingManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls publishing an experiment to our Firestore database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublishingManager(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
      This constructor initializes this instance's database with the passed one.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map createExperimentMap(Experiment experiment, java.lang.String userName)
      This method creates a map of values necessary for experiment in the database based on the Experiment object's values.
      void publishExperiment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> experimentData)
      This method publishes the experiment to the Firestore database.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PublishingManager

        public PublishingManager(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
        This constructor initializes this instance's database with the passed one.
        Parameters:
        db - db is the FirebaseFirestore to be used as the database for this instance.

    • Method Detail

      • publishExperiment

        public void publishExperiment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> experimentData)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method publishes the experiment to the Firestore database.
        Parameters:
        experimentData - experimentData is a map of values to be published to the database as an experiment.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createExperimentMap

        public java.util.Map createExperimentMap(Experiment experiment,
                                         java.lang.String userName)
        This method creates a map of values necessary for experiment in the database based on the Experiment object's values.
        Parameters:
        experiment - experiment is an Experiment object whose variables are to be used to values in the map.
        Returns:
        a Map that has all necessary key-value pairs is returned.
